Configuration.Name: Persee Search
Configuration.Author: Karen Okamoto, IDS Project
Configuration.Description: Searches Persee for ISxN, Title, and Author for loans and articles.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not the search should be done automatically when the request is opened.

Setting.name: StartwithTitle
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not the Addon should start the search with item Title.

Setting.name: StartwithAuthor
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not the Addon should start the search with item Author.

Setting.name: StartwithISxN
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not the Addon should start the search with item ISxN.
